title: Ticket #1889: condor_userlog should print out filtered events
description: While implementing #1664, I noticed that it would be REALLY helpful if condor_userlog could be told to emit to stdout the events matching a particular jobid or cluster from a user job logfile. How many stupid perl functions have we written over the years to do the same thing? Too many, that's how many.
remarks: This may have originated as the indirect result of a LIGO ticket (#1664), but it's not something LIGO is asking for, so I'm removing us as the customer group.
creator: psilord
